00062 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00063 /// CPuzzleGraphModel::addEdge
00064 ///
00065 /// @description           This function adds an edge between the two indicated
00066 ///                        nodes.  If the bidirectional flag is marked true,
00067 ///                        the new edge is bidirectional, otherwise, it is
00068 ///                        directional from node 1 to node 2.
00069 /// @pre                   None
00070 /// @post                  A new edge is created according to the given
00071 ///                        parameters.
00072 ///
00073 /// @param node1:          This is the index value of the first node the edge
00074 ///                        is connected to.
00075 /// @param node2:          This is the index value of the second node the edge
00076 ///                        is connected to.
00077 /// @param bidirectional:  This variable is used to indicate if the edge is
00078 ///                        bidirectional (true) or directional (false).
00079 ///
00080 /// @limitations           None
00081 ///
00082 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00083 void CPuzzleGraphModel::addEdge( int node1, int node2, bool bidirectional )
00084 {
00085     //Find any existing span for the 2 nodes, as the edge is added to the span.
00086     int span = findSpan( node1, node2 );
00087     if ( span == -1 )
00088         span = newSpan( node1, node2 );
00089 
00090     SPuzzleSpan *pSpan = m_data->getSpanList()[ span ];
00091 
00092     //If the new edge is bidirectional, change the span to indicate a
00093     //bidirectional edge.
00094     if ( bidirectional )
00095         pSpan->s_flag = SPuzzleSpan::Bidirectional;
00096     else
00097     {
00098         //Initially indicate the edge is coming from node 1 and going to node 2.
00099         bool from1 = true;
00100 
00101         //Check if the span is stored with the given nodes in reverse order and
00102         //flip the edge direction if they are.
00103         if ( m_data->getNodeList().indexOf( pSpan->s_node1 ) != node1 )
00104             from1 = false;
00105 
00106         if ( from1 )
00107             pSpan->s_flag = SPuzzleSpan::SpanFlag( pSpan->s_flag |
00108                                                    SPuzzleSpan::From1 );
00109         else
00110             pSpan->s_flag = SPuzzleSpan::SpanFlag( pSpan->s_flag |
00111                                                    SPuzzleSpan::From2 );
00112 
00113         //If a bidirectional edge previously existed, overwrite it with a split
00114         //span.
00115         if ( pSpan->s_flag == SPuzzleSpan::Bidirectional )
00116             pSpan->s_flag = SPuzzleSpan::Split;
00117     }
00118 
00119  emit changed();
00120 }

00142

00189 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00190 /// CPuzzleGraphModel::deleteNodeAt
00191 ///
00192 /// @description   This function deletes the node located at the given position
00193 ///                in the QList.
00194 /// @pre           None
00195 /// @post          The indicated node is deleted, if present.
00196 ///
00197 /// @param index:  This is the index into the QList of the node to be deleted.
00198 ///
00199 /// @limitations   None
00200 ///
00201 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00202 void CPuzzleGraphModel::deleteNodeAt(int index)
00203 {
00204     if (m_data != NULL && m_data->getNodeList().size() > index && index >= 0)
00205     {
00206         SPuzzleNode *node = m_data->getNodeList().takeAt(index);
00207         SPuzzleSpan *span;
00208         foreach(span, node->s_spanList)
00209         {
00210             m_data->getSpanList().removeAt(m_data->getSpanList().indexOf(span));
00211         }
00212 
00213         delete node;
00214     }
00215 
00216     emit changed();
00217 }
00218

00255 ///
00256 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00257 void CPuzzleGraphModel::editNodeEndFlag(int index, bool flag)
00258 {
00259     if (m_data != NULL && m_data->getNodeList().size() > index && index >= 0)
00260     {
00261         SPuzzleNode *node = m_data->getNodeList().at(index);
00262         if (flag)
00263             node->s_flag =
00264                 SPuzzleNode::NodeFlag(node->s_flag | SPuzzleNode::EndNode);
00265         else
00266             node->s_flag =
00267                 SPuzzleNode::NodeFlag(node->s_flag ^ SPuzzleNode::EndNode);
00268     }
00269 
00270     emit changed();
00271 }

00345 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00346 /// CPuzzleGraphModel::editNodeStartFlag
00347 ///
00348 /// @description   This function sets the start node flag of the node at the
00349 ///                given index into the QList.
00350 /// @pre           None
00351 /// @post          The flag of the given node is updated.
00352 ///
00353 /// @param index:  This is the index into the QList of the node to be edited.
00354 /// @param flag:   This is the value used to indicate if the node is an start
00355 ///                node or not.  True indicates the node is an start node.
00356 ///
00357 /// @limitations   None
00358 ///
00359 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00360 void CPuzzleGraphModel::editNodeStartFlag(int index, bool flag)
00361 {
00362     if (m_data != NULL)
00363     {
00364         SPuzzleNode *node = m_data->getNodeList().at(index);
00365         if (flag)
00366         {
00367             if (m_data->getStartNode() == NULL)
00368             {
00369                 node->s_flag =
00370                     SPuzzleNode::NodeFlag(
00371                         node->s_flag | SPuzzleNode::StartNode);
00372                 m_data->setStartNode(node);
00373             }
00374         }
00375         else
00376         {
00377             if (m_data->getStartNode() == node)
00378             {
00379                 node->s_flag =
00380                     SPuzzleNode::NodeFlag(
00381                         node->s_flag ^ SPuzzleNode::StartNode);
00382                 m_data->setStartNode(NULL);
00383             }
00384         }
00385     }
00386 
00387     emit changed();
00388 }

00465 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00466 /// CPuzzleGraphModel::findEdge
00467 ///
00468 /// @description     This function is used to detect if the user clicked on a
00469 ///                  span and if so the index of that span
00470 ///
00471 /// @pre             None
00472 /// @post            None
00473 ///
00474 /// @param p:        The mouse click point
00475 /// @param span:     Is set to the index of the clicked span or -1 is no span
00476 ///                  was clicked.
00477 /// @param type:     Is set to the type of span clicked...
00478 ///                  1  span from node1 to node2 was clicked
00479 ///                  2  span from node2 to node1 was clicked
00480 ///                  3  span is bidirectional
00481 ///
00482 /// @return void:    No return information is given
00483 ///
00484 /// @limitations     None
00485 ///
00486 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00487 void CPuzzleGraphModel::findEdge(QPoint p, int &span, int &type) const
00488 {
00489     int index = 0;
00490 
00491     span = -1;
00492     type = -1;
00493 
00494     while(true)
00495     {
00496         if(index >= getSpanCount()) break;
00497 
00498         if(getSpanAt(index)->s_flag != SPuzzleSpan::Split)
00499         {
00500             if(testEdgeNormal(p, index, type) == true) { span = index; break; }
00501         }
00502         else
00503         {
00504             if(testEdgeSplit(p, index, type) == true)  { span = index; break; }
00505         }
00506 
00507         index++;
00508     }
00509 }
00510 
00511 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00512 /// CPuzzleGraphModel::findWeight
00513 ///
00514 /// @description     This function is used to detect if the user clicked on a
00515 ///                  span and if so the index of that span
00516 ///
00517 /// @pre             None
00518 /// @post            None
00519 ///
00520 /// @param p:        The mouse click point
00521 /// @param span:     Is set to the index of the clicked span or -1 is no span
00522 ///                  was clicked.
00523 /// @param type:     Is set to the type of span clicked...
00524 ///                  1  weight from node1 to node2 was clicked
00525 ///                  2  weight from node2 to node1 was clicked
00526 ///                  3  weight from node1 to and from node2
00527 ///
00528 /// @return void:    No return information is given
00529 ///
00530 /// @limitations     None
00531 ///
00532 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00533 void CPuzzleGraphModel::findWeight(QPoint p, int &span, int &type) const
00534 {
00535     int index = 0;
00536     span = -1;
00537     type = -1;
00538     while(true)
00539     {
00540         if(index >= getSpanCount()) break;
00541         if(testEdgeWeight(p, index, type) == true)
00542             { span = index; break; }
00543         index++;
00544     }
00545 }
00546 
00547 
00548 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00549 /// CPuzzleGraphModel::testEdgeWeight
00550 ///
00551 /// @description    This function is used to test if the user clicked on an edge
00552 ///                 weight (that is the text used to indicate the edge weight)
00553 ///
00554 /// @pre            None
00555 /// @post           Collision case is returned
00556 ///
00557 /// @param p:       The mouse click point
00558 /// @param index:   The index of the span to check
00559 /// @param type:    The type of span clicked...
00560 ///                 1 edge weight from node1 to node2 was clicked
00561 ///                 2 edge weight from node2 to node1 was clicked
00562 ///                 3 edge was bidirectional
00563 ///
00564 /// @return bool:   True if p is on the edge weight / ow false
00565 ///
00566 /// @limitations    None
00567 ///
00568 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00569 bool CPuzzleGraphModel::testEdgeWeight(QPoint p, int index, int &type) const
00570 {
00571     QFontMetrics          metrics(m_style->getFont());
00572     QRect                 rect;
00573     SPuzzleSpan::SpanFlag flag = getSpanAt(index)->s_flag;
00574     QString               w1   = QString::number(getSpanAt(index)->s_weightFrom1);
00575     QString               w2   = QString::number(getSpanAt(index)->s_weightFrom2);
00576 
00577     float  a1, b1, c1;  // Plane equation
00578     float  x0, y0;      // Node1 position
00579     float  x1, y1;      // Node2 position
00580 
00581     // Construct plane equation
00582     x0 = getSpanAt(index)->s_node1->s_position.x();
00583     y0 = getSpanAt(index)->s_node1->s_position.y();
00584     x1 = getSpanAt(index)->s_node2->s_position.x();
00585     y1 = getSpanAt(index)->s_node2->s_position.y();
00586     getPlaneEquation(x0, y0, x1, y1, a1, b1, c1);
00587     a1 *= -1.0f; b1 *= -1.0f; c1 *= -1.0f;
00588 
00589     if(flag != SPuzzleSpan::Split)
00590     {
00591         if(flag == SPuzzleSpan::From1) { rect = metrics.boundingRect(w1); type = 1; }
00592         if(flag == SPuzzleSpan::From2) { rect = metrics.boundingRect(w2); type = 2; }
00593         else                           { rect = metrics.boundingRect(w1); type = 3; }
00594 
00595         // Calc midpoint of text box
00596         x0 = 0.5f * (x0+x1) + 5.0f * a1;
00597         y0 = 0.5f * (y0+y1) + 5.0f * b1;
00598         x0 += 0.5f * (float)rect.width()  * a1;
00599         y0 += 0.5f * (float)rect.height() * b1;
00600 
00601         // Calc upper left corner of text box
00602         x0 -= 0.5f * (float)rect.width();
00603         y0 -= 0.5f * (float)rect.height();
00604 
00605         // Calc bottom right coordinate of text box
00606         x1 = x0 + rect.width();
00607         y1 = y0 + rect.height();
00608 
00609         // Bounding box test
00610         if((x0<p.x())&&(x1>p.x()) && (y0<p.y())&&(y1>p.y()))
00611             return true;
00612         else
00613             return false;
00614     }
00615 
00616     // If click is in the pos half space of plane we should check the node1 -> node2 curve
00617     // If click in in the neg half space of plane we should check the node2 -> node1 curve
00618     if((a1*p.x() + b1*p.y() + c1) > 0.0f)
00619     {
00620         type = 1;
00621         rect = metrics.boundingRect(w1);
00622     }
00623     else
00624     {
00625         type = 2;
00626         rect = metrics.boundingRect(w2);
00627         a1 *= -1.0f;
00628         b1 *= -1.0f;
00629     }
00630 
00631     // Calc midpoint of text box on
00632     x0 = 0.5f * (x0+x1) + (5.0f + m_style->getNodeRadius()) * a1;
00633     y0 = 0.5f * (y0+y1) + (5.0f + m_style->getNodeRadius()) * b1;
00634     x0 += 0.5f * (float)rect.width()  * a1;
00635     y0 += 0.5f * (float)rect.height() * b1;
00636 
00637     // Calc upper left corner of text box
00638     x0 -= 0.5f * (float)rect.width();
00639     y0 -= 0.5f * (float)rect.height();
00640 
00641     // Calc bottom right coordinate of text box
00642     x1 = x0 + rect.width();
00643     y1 = y0 + rect.height();
00644 
00645     // Bounding box test
00646     if((x0<p.x())&&(x1>p.x()) && (y0<p.y())&&(y1>p.y())) {           return true;  }
00647     else                                                 { type = 0; return false; }
00648 }
00649 
00650 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00651 /// CPuzzleGraphModel::testEdgeSplit
00652 ///
00653 /// @description    This function is used to test if the user clicked on an edge
00654 ///                 between two nodes that is drawn as a cubic benzier spline.
00655 ///
00656 /// @pre            None
00657 /// @post           Collision case is returned
00658 ///
00659 /// @param p:       The mouse click point
00660 /// @param index:   The index of the span to check
00661 /// @param type:    The type of span clicked...
00662 ///                 1 span from node1 to node2 was clicked
00663 ///                 2 span from node2 to node1 was clicked
00664 ///
00665 /// @return bool:   True if p is on the curve / ow false
00666 ///
00667 /// @limitations    None
00668 ///
00669 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00670 bool CPuzzleGraphModel::testEdgeSplit(QPoint p, int index, int &type) const
00671 {
00672     static const float cost   = cosf(0.392699f);
00673     static const float sint   = sinf(0.392699f);
00674     const float        r      = (float)(m_style->getNodeRadius());
00675     float              delta  = (float)(m_style->getPen().width()+2) / 2.0f;
00676                        delta *= delta;
00677 
00678     int    count;           // Bisection iteration cound
00679     float  a1, b1, c1;      // Plane equation 1
00680     float  a2, b2, c2;      // Plane equation 2
00681     float  a3, b3, c3;      // Plane equation 3
00682     float  d1, d2, d3;      // Distance mouse click is from plane 1, 2, 3
00683     float  x0, y0, x1, y1;  // Points used to generate plane equations...
00684     float  x2, y2, x3, y3;  // ...
00685     float  ax, bx, cx;      // X-axis Benzier coefficeints
00686     float  ay, by, cy;      // Y-axis Benzier coefficeints
00687     float  u,  u0, u1;      // Misc variables
00688     float  m;               // Dist from node1 to node2
00689 
00690     // Construct plane 1
00691     x0 = getSpanAt(index)->s_node1->s_position.x();
00692     y0 = getSpanAt(index)->s_node1->s_position.y();
00693     x3 = getSpanAt(index)->s_node2->s_position.x();
00694     y3 = getSpanAt(index)->s_node2->s_position.y();
00695     getPlaneEquation(x0, y0, x3, y3, a1, b1, c1);
00696 
00697     // Construct plane 2
00698     x1 = x0 + a1 * delta; y1 = y0 + b1 * delta;
00699     x2 = x0 - a1 * delta; y2 = y0 - b1 * delta;
00700     getPlaneEquation(x1, y1, x2, y2, a2, b2, c2);
00701 
00702     // Construct plane 3
00703     x1 = x3 - a1 * delta; y1 = y3 - b1 * delta;
00704     x2 = x3 + a1 * delta; y2 = y3 + b1 * delta;
00705     getPlaneEquation(x1, y1, x2, y2, a3, b3, c3);
00706 
00707     // Get the distance away from each plane
00708     d1 = a1*p.x() + b1*p.y() + c1;
00709     d2 = a2*p.x() + b2*p.y() + c2;
00710     d3 = a3*p.x() + b3*p.y() + c3;
00711 
00712     // Check for early out
00713     if(d2 < 0.0f) return false;
00714     if(d3 < 0.0f) return false;
00715 
00716     // Calc distance from node1 to node2
00717     m = sqrtf((x0-x3)*(x0-x3) + (y0-y2)*(y0-y3));
00718 
00719     // The current coordinate sytem is realative to node1
00720     // The origin is the center of node1
00721     // The x-axis points form node1 to node2
00722     // The y-axsi is 90 counter clockwise off the x-axis
00723     // The x-coord of the mouse click is d2
00724     // The y-coord of the mouse click is d1
00725 
00726     // Calculate benzier spline control points
00727     x0 = r * cost;          y0 = r * sint;          // Start point
00728     x3 = m - x0;            y3 = y0;                // End point
00729     x1 = x0 + 2.0f * x0;    y1 = y0 + 2.0f * y0;    // Control point 1
00730     x2 = x3 - 2.0f * x0;    y2 = y3 + 2.0f * y0;    // Control point 2
00731 
00732     // If the click is below the x-axis we want to check the bottom spline
00733     // curve instead of the top...so flip the control points about the y-axis
00734     if(d1 < 0.0f)
00735     {
00736         y0 *= -1.0f; y1 *= -1.0f;
00737         y2 *= -1.0f; y3 *= -1.0f;
00738     }
00739 
00740     // Calculate benzier spline constants
00741     cx = 3.0f * (x1-x0);        cy = 3.0f * (y1-y0);
00742     bx = 3.0f * (x2-x1)-cx;     by = 3.0f * (y2-y1)-cy;
00743     ax = x3-x0-cx-bx;           ay = y3-y0-cy-by;
00744 
00745     // Initialize bisection search parameters
00746     u0 = 0.0f; u1 = 1.0f; count = 10;
00747 
00748     // Begin search
00749     while(count > 0)
00750     {
00751         // Calc search parameter
00752         u  = (u0 + u1) / 2.0f;
00753 
00754         // Line from spline point to mouse click
00755         x1 = d2 - (ax*u*u*u + bx*u*u + cx*u + x0);
00756         y1 = d1 - (ay*u*u*u + by*u*u + cy*u + y0);
00757 
00758         // Tangent on spline
00759         x2 = 3*ax*u*u + 2*bx*u + cx;
00760         y2 = 3*ay*u*u + 2*by*u + cy;
00761 
00762         // Figure out how to adjust u
00763         d3 = x1*x2 + y1*y2;
00764         if     (d3 < 0.0f) { u1 = u; }
00765         else if(d3 > 0.0f) { u0 = u; }
00766         else               { break;  }
00767         count--;
00768     }
00769 
00770     // Calc approx distance from spline curve
00771     d3 = x1*x1 + y1*y1;
00772 
00773     // Return collision case
00774     if(d3 < delta)
00775     {
00776         if(d1 < 0.0f) { type = 1; return true; }
00777         else          { type = 2; return true; }
00778     }
00779     else return false;
00780 }
00781 
00782 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00783 /// CPuzzleGraphModel::testEdgeNormal
00784 ///
00785 /// @description    This function is used to test if the user clicked on an edge
00786 ///                 between two nodes that is drawn as a straight line
00787 ///
00788 /// @pre            None
00789 /// @post           Collision case is returned
00790 ///
00791 /// @param p:        The mouse click point
00792 /// @param index:    The index of the span to check
00793 /// @param span:     Is set to the value of index if the indexed span was
00794 ///                  clicked on
00795 /// @param type:     The type of span clicked...
00796 ///                  1   span from node1 to node2 was clicked
00797 ///                  2   span from node2 to node1 was clicked
00798 ///                  3   span was bidirectional
00799 ///
00800 /// @return bool:   True if p is on the curve / ow false
00801 ///
00802 /// @limitations    None
00803 ///
00804 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00805 bool CPuzzleGraphModel::testEdgeNormal(QPoint p, int index, int &type) const
00806 {
00807     const float delta = (float)(m_style->getPen().width()+2) / 2.0f;
00808 
00809     float  a1, b1, c1;      // Plane equation 1
00810     float  a2, b2, c2;      // Plane equation 2
00811     float  a3, b3, c3;      // Plane equation 3
00812     float  d1, d2, d3;      // Distance mouse click is from plane 1, 2, 3
00813     float  x0, y0, x1, y1;  // Points used to generate plane equations...
00814     float  x2, y2, x3, y3;  // ...
00815 
00816     // Construct plane 1
00817     x0 = getSpanAt(index)->s_node1->s_position.x();
00818     y0 = getSpanAt(index)->s_node1->s_position.y();
00819     x3 = getSpanAt(index)->s_node2->s_position.x();
00820     y3 = getSpanAt(index)->s_node2->s_position.y();
00821     getPlaneEquation(x0, y0, x3, y3, a1, b1, c1);
00822 
00823     // Construct plane 2
00824     x1 = x0 + a1 * delta; y1 = y0 + b1 * delta;
00825     x2 = x0 - a1 * delta; y2 = y0 - b1 * delta;
00826     getPlaneEquation(x1, y1, x2, y2, a2, b2, c2);
00827 
00828     // Construct plane 3
00829     x1 = x3 - a1 * delta; y1 = y3 - b1 * delta;
00830     x2 = x3 + a1 * delta; y2 = y3 + b1 * delta;
00831     getPlaneEquation(x1, y1, x2, y2, a3, b3, c3);
00832 
00833     // Get the distance away from each plane
00834     d1 = a1*p.x() + b1*p.y() + c1;
00835     d2 = a2*p.x() + b2*p.y() + c2;
00836     d3 = a3*p.x() + b3*p.y() + c3;
00837 
00838     // Try to reject containment
00839     if(d2 < 0.0f)   return false;
00840     if(d3 < 0.0f)   return false;
00841     if(d1 < -delta) return false;
00842     if(d1 >  delta) return false;
00843 
00844     // An edge was clicked...
00845     if     (getSpanAt(index)->s_flag == SPuzzleSpan::From1)         type = 1;
00846     else if(getSpanAt(index)->s_flag == SPuzzleSpan::From2)         type = 2;
00847     else if(getSpanAt(index)->s_flag == SPuzzleSpan::Bidirectional) type = 3;
00848     return true;
00849 }
00850 
00851 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00852 /// CPuzzleGraphModel::getPlaneEquation
00853 ///
00854 /// @description     This function is used to calculate the normalized plane
00855 ///                  equation from the two points (x1,y1) and (x2,y2)...
00856 ///                  The values return by a, b, and c are the parameters of the
00857 ///                  normalized plane equation derived from the line
00858 ///                  (x1,y1)----->(x2,x2) where:
00859 ///                  0 = ax + by + c
00860 ///                  holds for any (x,y) on the plane. Additionaly the
00861 ///                  perpendicular distance within either half space of the
00862 ///                  plane can be computed by:
00863 ///                  dist = ax + by + c
00864 ///                  Positive values indicate (x,y) is in the "upper" half space
00865 ///                  of the plane. The "upper" half is in the direction of the
00866 ///                  normal vector the line segment (x1,y1)---->(x2,y2).
00867 ///                  Negative value indicate the opposite. Finally the magnitude
00868 ///                  of dist is equal to the length of the line from (x,y) to a
00869 ///                  point on the plane such that angle of incidence is 90 degrees.
00870 ///
00871 /// @pre             None
00872 /// @post            None
00873 ///
00874 /// @param x1:       x coordinate of point 1
00875 /// @param y1:       y coordinate of point 1
00876 /// @param x2:       x coordinate of point 2
00877 /// @param y2:       y coordinate of point 2
00878 /// @param a:        plane constant
00879 /// @param b:        plane constant
00880 /// @param c:        plane constant
00881 ///
00882 /// @return void     No return information is given
00883 ///
00884 /// @limitations     None
00885 ///
00886 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00887 void CPuzzleGraphModel::getPlaneEquation(float x1, float y1, float x2, float y2,
00888                                          float &a, float &b, float &c) const
00889 {
00890     float m;
00891     a = y1 - y2;
00892     b = x2 - x1;
00893     c = -1.0f * (a*x1 + b*y1);
00894     m = 1.0f / sqrtf(a*a + b*b);
00895     a *= m;
00896     b *= m;
00897     c *= m;
00898 }
00899 
00900 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00901 /// CPuzzleGraphModel::findNode
00902 ///
00903 /// @description  This function attempts to find a node at the given point.  If
00904 ///               a node is found, the index of the node in the QList of nodes
00905 ///               is returned, otherwise, -1 is returned.
00906 /// @pre          None
00907 /// @post         None
00908 ///
00909 /// @param p:     This is the point to check for a node at.
00910 ///
00911 /// @return int:  Returns the index of the node if found, and -1 otherwise.
00912 ///
00913 /// @limitations  None
00914 ///
00915 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00916 int CPuzzleGraphModel::findNode( QPoint p ) const
00917 {
00918     float radius = m_style->getNodeRadius();
00919     radius += m_style->getPen().width() / 2.0;
00920     int radiusSq = static_cast<int>(radius*radius);
00921 
00922     float bold = radius + m_style->getBoldWidth() / 2.0;
00923     int boldSq = static_cast<int>(bold*bold);
00924 
00925     QRect quickMid(0, 0, (int)radius*2, (int)radius*2);
00926     QRect quickEnd(0, 0, (int)bold*2, (int)bold*2);
00927     quickMid.moveCenter( p );
00928     quickEnd.moveCenter( p );
00929 
00930     int curRadiusSq, xSq, ySq;
00931     const SPuzzleNode *curNode;
00932 
00933     //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00934     //
00935     // Description:   This loop goes through the list of nodes in
00936     //                reverse order so top most nodes are selected
00937     //                before lower nodes.  It checks each node for
00938     //                the given point and returns the first node found
00939     //                which contains the given point.
00940     //
00941     // Precondition:  None
00942     // Postcondition: If the loop completes without returning from the
00943     //                function, no node was found at the given point.
00944     //
00945     //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00946     for( int i = getNodeCount()-1; i >= 0; --i )
00947     {
00948         curRadiusSq = 0;
00949         curNode = getNodeAt( i );
00950         if( curNode->s_flag & SPuzzleNode::EndNode )
00951         {
00952             if( quickEnd.contains( curNode->s_position ) )
00953                 curRadiusSq = boldSq;
00954         }
00955         else
00956         {
00957             if( quickMid.contains( curNode->s_position ) )
00958                 curRadiusSq = radiusSq;
00959         }
00960 
00961         if( curRadiusSq > 0.0 )
00962         {
00963             xSq = abs(curNode->s_position.x() - p.x());
00964             xSq *= xSq;
00965 
00966             ySq = abs(curNode->s_position.y() - p.y());
00967             ySq *= ySq;
00968 
00969             if( (xSq + ySq) < curRadiusSq )
00970                 return i;
00971         }
00972     }
00973 
00974     return -1;
00975 }
00976 
00977 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00978 /// CPuzzleGraphModel::findSpan
00979 ///
00980 /// @description   This function attempts to find a span which has the 2 given
00981 ///                nodes as end points.  It returns the index of the span if
00982 ///                one is found and -1 if no span is found.
00983 /// @pre           None
00984 /// @post          None
00985 ///
00986 /// @param node1:  This is the index of one of the nodes for the span.
00987 /// @param node2:  This is the index of the other node for the span.
00988 ///
00989 /// @return int:   Returns the index of the span if it is found and -1
00990 ///                otherwise.
00991 ///
00992 /// @limitations   None
00993 ///
00994 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00995 int CPuzzleGraphModel::findSpan( int node1, int node2 ) const
00996 {
00997     SPuzzleNode *pNode1 = m_data->getNodeList()[ node1 ];
00998     SPuzzleNode *pNode2 = m_data->getNodeList()[ node2 ];
00999     SPuzzleSpan *pSpan;
01000 
01001     //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01002     //
01003     // Description:   This loop iterates through the span list looking
01004     //                for a span with the 2 given node endpoints.
01005     //
01006     // Precondition:  None
01007     // Postcondition: If the loop completes without returning from the
01008     //                function, no span was found.
01009     //
01010     //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01011     for ( int i = 0; i < m_data->getSpanList().size(); i++ )
01012     {
01013         pSpan = m_data->getSpanList()[ i ];
01014 
01015         if ( ( pSpan->s_node1 == pNode1 && pSpan->s_node2 == pNode2 ) ||
01016              ( pSpan->s_node1 == pNode2 && pSpan->s_node2 == pNode1 ) )
01017              return i;
01018     }
01019 
01020     return -1;
01021 }
01022 
01023 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01024 /// CPuzzleGraphModel::getContainingRect
01025 ///
01026 /// @description    This function returns a QRect which contains all the nodes
01027 ///                 currently in the graph.
01028 /// @pre            None
01029 /// @post           None
01030 ///
01031 /// @return QRect:  Returns a QRect which contains all the nodes.
01032 ///
01033 /// @limitations    None
01034 ///
01035 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01036 QRect CPuzzleGraphModel::getContainingRect() const
01037 {
01038     if( m_data == NULL || m_data->getNodeList().size() == 0 )
01039         return QRect();
01040 
01041     SPuzzleNode *i = m_data->getNodeList()[0];
01042     QRect ret( i->s_position, QSize( 1,1 ) );
01043 
01044     foreach( i, m_data->getNodeList() )
01045         ret |= QRect( i->s_position, QSize( 1,1 ) );
01046 
01047     CStyleToolkit *style = CStyleToolkit::instance();
01048     int adjust = style->getNodeRadius() + style->getBoldWidth() +
01049                  style->getPen().width();
01050 
01051     ret.adjust( -adjust, -adjust, adjust, adjust );
01052 
01053     return ret;
01054 }
01055 
01056 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01057 /// CPuzzleGraphModel::getNodeAt
01058 ///
01059 /// @description            This function returns a pointer to the node at the
01060 ///                         given index in the QList.
01061 /// @pre                    None
01062 /// @post                   None
01063 ///
01064 /// @param index:           This is the index into the QList of the node to be
01065 ///                         retrieved.
01066 ///
01067 /// @return SPuzzleNode *:  Returns a pointer to the node at the given index
01068 ///                         location in the node QList.
01069 ///
01070 /// @limitations            None
01071 ///
01072 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01073 const SPuzzleNode * CPuzzleGraphModel::getNodeAt(int index) const
01074 {
01075     SPuzzleNode *node = NULL;
01076 
01077     if (m_data != NULL && m_data->getNodeList().size() > index && index >= 0)
01078     {
01079         node = m_data->getNodeList().at(index);
01080     }
01081 
01082     return node;
01083 }
01084 
01085 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01086 /// CPuzzleGraphModel::getNodeCount
01087 ///

01092 /// @return int:  Returns the number of nodes in the QList.
01093 ///
01094 /// @limitations  None
01095 ///
01096 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01097 int CPuzzleGraphModel::getNodeCount() const
01098 {
01099     int size = 0;
01100     if (m_data != NULL)
01101     {
01102         size = m_data->getNodeList().size();
01103     }
01104     return size;
01105 }

01127

01129     {

01131     }
01132 
01133     return span;
01134 }

01136 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

01158 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01159 /// CPuzzleGraphModel::getStartNode
01160 ///
01161 /// @description            This function returns a pointer to the start node
01162 ///                         of the puzzle.
01163 /// @pre                    None
01164 /// @post                   None
01165 ///
01166 /// @return SPuzzleNode *:  Returns a pointer to the start node of the puzzle.
01167 ///
01168 /// @limitations            None
01169 ///
01170 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01171 SPuzzleNode * CPuzzleGraphModel::getStartNode() const
01172 {
01173     SPuzzleNode *node = NULL;
01174     if ( m_data != NULL )
01175         node = m_data->getStartNode();
01176 
01177     return node;
01178 }

01180 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01181 /// CPuzzleGraphModel::getGoalNodeList
01182 ///
01183 /// @description            This function returns a list of pointer to every
01184 ///                         goal node of the puzzle.
01185 /// @pre                    None
01186 /// @post                   None
01187 ///
01188 /// @return SPuzzleNode *:  List of pointers to all goal nodes in the puzzle.
01189 ///
01190 /// @limitations            None
01191 ///
01192 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01193 QList<SPuzzleNode *> CPuzzleGraphModel::getGoalNodeList() const
01194 {
01195     QList<SPuzzleNode *> goals;
01196     SPuzzleNode * node;
01197     foreach(node, m_data->getNodeList())
01198     {
01199         if((node->s_flag & SPuzzleNode::EndNode) != 0)
01200             goals.append(node);
01201     }
01202     return goals;
01203 }

01205 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01206 /// CPuzzleGraphModel::load
01207 ///
01208 /// @description      This function loads the data from the given file.
01209 /// @pre              None
01210 /// @post             The given file is loaded into the program.
01211 ///
01212 /// @param filename:  This is the filename to be loaded.
01213 ///
01214 /// @limitations      None
01215 ///
01216 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01217 void CPuzzleGraphModel::load( const QString &filename )
01218 {
01219     if (m_data == NULL)
01220     {
01221         createNewData();
01222     }
01223     m_data->load(filename);
01224 }
01225 
01226 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01227 /// CPuzzleGraphModel::newNode
01228 ///
01229 /// @description  This function creates a new node and adds it to the graph.  It
01230 ///               returns the index to the newly created node once it has been
01231 ///               added to the graph.
01232 /// @pre          None
01233 /// @post         A new node is added to the graph.
01234 ///
01235 /// @return int:  Returns index to the newly created node.
01236 ///
01237 /// @limitations  None
01238 ///
01239 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01240 int CPuzzleGraphModel::newNode()
01241 {
01242     SPuzzleNode *node = new SPuzzleNode;
01243 
01244     addNode( node );
01245 
01246     return m_data->getNodeList().indexOf( node );
01247 }
01248 
01249 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01250 /// CPuzzleGraphModel::newSpan
01251 ///
01252 /// @description   This function creates a new span with the given nodes as
01253 ///                endpoints and returns the index of the new span.
01254 /// @pre           None
01255 /// @post          A new span is created with the given nodes as endpoints.
01256 ///
01257 /// @param node1:  This is the index of one of the nodes for the span.
01258 /// @param node2:  This is the index of the other node for the span.
01259 ///
01260 /// @return int:   Returns the index to the new span.
01261 ///
01262 /// @limitations   None
01263 ///
01264 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01265 int CPuzzleGraphModel::newSpan( int node1, int node2 )
01266 {
01267     SPuzzleSpan *span = new SPuzzleSpan;
01268     span->s_node1 = m_data->getNodeList()[node1];
01269     span->s_node2 = m_data->getNodeList()[node2];
01270 
01271     addSpan( span );
01272     span->s_node1->s_spanList.append(span);
01273     span->s_node2->s_spanList.append(span);
01274 
01275     return m_data->getSpanList().indexOf( span );
01276 }
01277 
01278 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01279 /// CPuzzleGraphModel::realignData
01280 ///
01281 /// @description      This function shifts the nodes so that all nodes are
01282 ///                   are painted in positive coordinates.
01283 /// @pre              None
01284 /// @post             The top left corner of every node is >= (0,0)
01285 ///
01286 /// @limitations      None
01287 ///
01288 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01289 void CPuzzleGraphModel::realignData()
01290 {
01291     QPoint shiftOffset = getContainingRect().topLeft();
01292     if( shiftOffset.x() >= 0 && shiftOffset.y() >= 0 )
01293         return;
01294 
01295     if( shiftOffset.x() > 0 )
01296         shiftOffset.setX( 0 );
01297     if( shiftOffset.y() > 0 )
01298         shiftOffset.setY( 0 );
01299 
01300     SPuzzleNode *i;
01301     foreach( i, m_data->getNodeList() )
01302     {
01303         i->s_position -= shiftOffset;
01304     }
01305 
01306     emit changed();
01307 }
01308 
01309 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01310 /// CPuzzleGraphModel::save
01311 ///
01312 /// @description      This function saves the current data to the given file.
01313 /// @pre              None
01314 /// @post             The data is saved to the given file.
01315 ///
01316 /// @param filename:  This is the filename to save the data to.
01317 ///
01318 /// @limitations      None
01319 ///
01320 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01321 void CPuzzleGraphModel::save( const QString &filename ) const
01322 {
01323     if (m_data != NULL)
01324     {
01325         m_data->save(filename);
01326     }
01327 }
